testcase.name: DCMEA-000000 - Login, Send & Sign
testcase.system-out: Given User sets the environment.............................................passed And Log in with user from "EU1".............................................passed And Click on send for signature.............................................passed And Select document from phone storage......................................passed And Enter agreement name and message........................................passed And Click on recipients button on send page.................................passed And Enter recipient from shard: "JP1".......................................passed And Click on done on Recipients Page........................................passed And Click on send button....................................................passed And Log in with user from "JP1" and sign, then log out......................passed When User is logged in as sender from shard "EU1"...........................passed Then Agreement should be in completed folder................................passed
